characters.name: Deirdre the Priestess
characters.good: The Goddess keeps Deirdre protected from harm.
characters.bad: The Goddess's protection does not help against alcohol. Deirdre is a cheap date.

characters.name: Fiona the Volatile
characters.good: She's more than capable of dishing out and taking serious physical abuse, and her formidable constitution allows her to drink a lot!
characters.bad: For all her strengths, she's not very good at keeping track of her Gold.

characters.name: Gerki the Sneak
characters.good: Gerki is so good at gambling that some people suspect that he might be cheating.

characters.name: Zot the Wizard
characters.good: Zot is good at card tricks, and, hence, is good at gambling. His mastery of many magical spells keeps him well protected, whether he's roughhousing, drinking, or gambling.

characters.name: Fleck the Bard
characters.good: Women want him, Men want to be him.
characters.bad: Sometimes... well okay, often... it goes to his head.

characters.name: Eve the Illusionist
characters.good: Eve is a very skilled Illusionist.
characters.bad: She's been known to use her skills on her fellow party members when she gets bored.

characters.name: Dimli the Dwarf
characters.good: He's got a lot of Gold and can pretty much drink anyone under the table!
characters.bad: Sometimes, he gets a little grumpy...
